channel.title: Era of the Gods | 667 | Economy | Bossing | PVP |
channel.description:
[CENTER]Era of the Gods 667[/CENTER] Era of the Gods is a brand new server created by Zaros and Ares. Our goal is to provide you with the most entertaining content possible. Era of the Gods is up 24/7 on a dedicated VPS with DDoS protection. Our website has just been added and our client is up and daily updates are to be expected! Below are just a few of the things that we have to offer you!
Forums: http://eraofthegods.com/forums/ Main site: http://eraofthegods.com/ Jar Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/9sp3990c79pcmyz/Era_of_the_Gods.jar]http://www.mediafire.com/download/9sp3990c79pcmyz/Era_of_the_Gods.jar[/url]
Dungeoneering Shop! [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/16bwuj4.png[/img]
Nex! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2gvri52.png[/img]
Revenants drop PVP armor! [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/15p01nc.png[/img]
Grand Exchange in the makings! [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/110vxvc.png[/img]
Lucky items! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2pri3hl.png[/img]
Home in Lletya! [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/v4ph6c.png[/img]
Torva | Pernix | Virtus | Korasi | Lucky items | Max & Completionist Capes | Goliath, Spellcaster, & Swift Gloves | Dicing | Chaotics | Colored Whips | Colored Dark Bows | Ornate Katana | Golden Scythe | Overloads | Curses Bosses:
All Godwars bosses including Nex Queen Black Dragon King Black Dragon, Corporeal Beast Tormented Demons Barrows Jad Bork Kalphite Queen Dagonoth Kings
PVM:
Dragons Revenants Slayer Rock Crabs Jadinko Lair Chickens (And not ordinary ones!)
PVP:
Easts Wests Multi Mage bank Duel Arena Clan wars Safe PVP option
All skills work, including Dungeoneering, Summoning, and Construction!
